Package com.example.matata

Class AddEventActivityTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.matata.AddEventActivityTest
public class AddEventActivityTest extends Object
The `AddEventActivityTest` class is an Espresso test suite designed to validate the functionality and user interface of the `TestAddEventActivity`. It includes tests for input fields, buttons, and interactions with time and date pickers.

Features Tested:

  • Initial UI state verification.
  • Input validation for event fields such as title, description, capacity, and location.
  • Button functionality for clearing fields and generating QR codes.
  • Interaction with date and time pickers.

Test Cases:

  • testInitialUIState: Verifies that input fields are empty upon activity launch.
  • testInputFields: Ensures input fields accept and display user-entered data correctly.
  • testClearButton: Validates that the "Clear All" button resets all fields to their default state.
  • testTimeAndDatePicker: Tests the functionality of date and time pickers.
  • testGenerateQRButton: Checks if the "Generate QR" button works when required fields are filled.

    • activityRule

      public androidx.test.ext.junit.rules.ActivityScenarioRule<TestAddEventActivity> activityRule
      ActivityScenarioRule launches the `TestAddEventActivity` for testing. Ensures the activity is initialized before each test and cleaned up afterward.
